title: What can I do?
text: Here you can [b]explore[/b] the website for different research papers and get to know the authors behind the work, [b]preview[/b] videos explaining each research’s proposed model, interactively [b]test it[/b] on adopted examples, and finally leave your fingerprint by [b]participating[/b] in its corresponding survey. As an initiative, the “Distribution of Cost Deviations in IPD Systems” is the website’s first research, with the hope of adding many more in the future.
